title: In-call volume is very low - what to do???
content:
Hi,

I own a Google Pixel 4 (128 GB) Black Unlocked.
My problem is that the in-call volume is very low. even when the settings are at maximum.

I can hear very good and normal through the phones speaker option or when earphones are connected.

is that hardware issue? or any recent update? it is like this for several months now.
